system.description:
Strike fast and strike through. Only if you can break your foes can your allies see victory. This is the Conquering King's primary attack: 7 Panglima Palms that create a burning sigil upon the enemy forces, crafted and passed down by others that would learn his ancient art.

Prereq: Laksaman Whetstone

Spend 1 Beat to perform the Panglima Palms: inflict Push 3 on an adjacent fighter and the next attack against that fighter gains Overwhelming.

Hell-Rending Heaven Palm: +1 Beat to give it the following effect: if the target collides with an ally, they suffer Stun (1).
